thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: JAMEL BANKOS

author: JAMEL BANKOS
title: JAMEL BANKOS
text: This is my first purchase using OptiContacts.com and I couldn't be happier. All I had to do is email a pic of prescription and choose the lenses. Unfortunately I send the eyeglass prescription instead of contact lens script but the customer service rep contacted me to get eye doc's phone number so they could get lens script for me! Really fast shipping once we had it straightened out!!! Thank you OptiContacts!!
